name: OLDP
summary: Open Legal Data Platform, maintained by Open Knowledge Deutschland
excerpt: At OLL 2022 we proposed the challenge to investigate, evaluate, discuss, and contribute to **efforts to improve interoperability** between platforms that collect and publish open legal data. Currently OLDP application only has data available from German courts. Documentation is available on [adding processing steps](https://oldp.readthedocs.io/en/latest/development.html) for additional data sources. Further details of the application below. The project can be reached here: [@openlegaldata](https...

name: legal-ml-datasets
summary: A collection of datasets and tasks for legal machine learning
excerpt:
# Datasets for Machine Learning in Law
This is a collection of pointers to datasets/tasks/benchmarks pertaining to the intersection of machine learning and law. 

This page is continually being updated. If there's a dataset/resource you think should be included here, please make a pull request adding it, or contact me at nguha@stanford.edu and I'll add it! 

Neel Guha


## Task agnostic datasets 
These datasets can be used for pretraining larger models. Alternatively, you cause them to construct...
